External id.long_desc: Unique identifier of image as provided by image capture platform

File path.long_desc: The relevant path (directory) of the image file, including its filename

Donor info - UNOS ID.long_desc: Unique donor identifier provided by donor agency.

Donor info - LIMS ID.long_desc: Unique donor identifier provided via Powers Laboratory LIMS

Donor info - Disease Status.long_desc: One of several diseases associated with donor - ND (No Disease), T1D (Type 1 Diabetes), T2D (Type 2 Diabetes)

Donor info - Disease Duration.long_desc: Time that disease was known/diagnosed in donor

Donor info - Age.long_desc: Age of donor at the time sample was collected

Image info - Section Plane.long_desc: Section plane collected of sample - saggital, coronal, transverse

Image info - Pancreas Region.long_desc: General region the sample was collected from - head, body, tail

Image info - File Type.long_desc: Imaging platform used to collect data

Image info - Analysis.long_desc: Whether or not associated/downstream analysis has been performed

(DS notes).long_desc: Notes left by annotator / safe to ignore

Warning.long_desc: Ideally you should not see this
